SINH(3) Library Functions Manual SINH(3)

NAME

sinh — hyperbolic sine function

SYNOPSIS

#include <math.h>

double
sinh(double x);

long double
sinhl(long double x);

float
sinhf(float x);

DESCRIPTION

The sinh() function computes the hyperbolic sine of x.

SPECIAL VALUES

sinh(±0) returns ±0.

sinh(±infinity) returns ±infinity.

SEE ALSO

acos(3), asin(3), atan(3), atan2(3), cos(3), cosh(3), sin(3), tan(3), tanh(3), math(3)

STANDARDS

The sinh() function conforms to ISO/IEC 9899:2011.

December 11, 2006 macOS 14.4
